content: **knitted christmas tree ball in drops lima and drops kid-silk piece is knitted with leaf pattern theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #winterwhisperbaubles drops design pattern li-192 yarn group b and a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** piece measures approx circumference = 38 cm height = 12 cm **yarn** colour option 1 drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 0100 off white drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25 g colour 01 off white colour option 2 drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 0100 off white drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25 g colour 45 soft mint **accessories** some cotton wool for filling string or left-over yarn for strap 1 ball weighs approx 18 g without filling **needles** drops double pointed needles size 4 mm **knitting gauge** 19 stitches in width and 25 row vertically on needle size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles -------------------------------------------------------
